itemDisplayName: Create an HDInsight Linux Cluster with RedPoint Data Management
description: This template creates an Azure HDInsight Linux cluster in a virtual network with two other VMs: (1) an Ubuntu edge node that is bootstrapped with the cluster's configurations and runs the Data Management server; and (2) a Windows VM that runs the Data Management client.
